title: Audible, Barnes & Noble Nook remove in-app purchases on Android over tightened Google rules
content:
The requirement to use in-app billing systems from app stores has come under heavy scrutiny over the past couple of years, and in that time Google has actually cracked down on some long-standing loopholes. Now, Amazon Audible and Barnes & Noble Nook have lost the ability to handle in-app purchases on Android over Google’s crackdown.

more…

The post Audible, Barnes & Noble Nook remove in-app purchases on Android over tightened Google rules appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Audible has dropped support for in-app purchases on Android, as has Nook, under Google's new Play Store billing policies.
